data.actual_result: Keyboard doesn't close and stays open without anything in focus
data.expected_result: Keyboard should close after selecting user
data.short_description: [Incoming Share] Selecting a channel/user doesn't close keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - Share something into Discord from an external source - Focus the channel/user search textfield. You can type something but that's optional, just make sure the textfield is focused and keyboard open  - Select a channel/user
